archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Personalize Customer Profile
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: The Personalize Customer Profile function creates a personalized profile signature based on combined segment, interest and behavior for the individual �customer� (ex. Soccer Mom, Gold/Silver/Bronze customer, Golfer, Early adopter), and around �content� (ex. Content sharing - College kids + Field Sales). This also includes continuous learning and update of individual �Profile Signature�
